org.terrier.statistics
Class GammaFunction

java.lang.Object
  org.terrier.statistics.GammaFunction

public abstract class GammaFunction
extends Object

Base class for implementations of the Gamma function. Use getGammaFunction() to obtain an instance. The exact instance can be controlled by property gamma.function

Properties:

  • gamma.function - class name of the Gamma function implementation. Defaults to use WikipediaLanczosGammaFunction

    Since:
    3.0
    Author:
    Craig Macdonald
